description: From Middle English grisbaten, from Old English gristbitian. Equivalent to grist (“to grind”) +‎ bite.

verbs.description: gristbite (third-person singular simple present gristbites, present participle gristbiting, simple past gristbit, past participle gristbitten or gristbit)

examples: Mrs. Tolpedden achieved a dashing cannon, and then gave a miss, at which she "grisbetted", as Milly called it.
